attributes.action: Crack down on drug addicts in harrow
attributes.additional_details: Harrow council have not got on top of this issue
attributes.background: Pleas join and sign this petition in Harrow we have a big problem with drug addicts and drug taking in our local flats and Estates on a daily basis myself and others have drug addicts forcing entry in 2 our blocks causing mess and trouble also frightening vulnerable residents

rejection.details:
If you think someone has committed a crime, you should contact the police:

https://www.police.uk/contact/

Housing issues are the responsibility of your local council. You could contact a local councillor who represents you. Find your local councillor here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
